participant_1.background:
I value my privacy most of all.
i am a professional skittles player.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.
I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
i can speak four languages fluently.

participant_2.background:
Losing my father was the hardest thing I've ever been through.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.
my favorite band is nickelback.
i am an old woman who lives on a social security check.
i love horses.

content.text: I hope you're having a good day!
Thank you, I am! I just got back from a walk with my horse.
How wonderful! I love horses. How old is he/she?
He is a 20 year old gelding. His name is Shadow.
Aww, that's a beautiful name for a horse. Do you have any other hobbies besides horses?
I love to read and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time. I'm sure your family is very lucky to have you.
Thank you, that's very kind of you to say. What are some of your hobbies?
I love to play basketball, listen to music, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those sound like great hobbies! What's your favorite basketball team?
I'm a big fan of the Golden State Warriors.
Nice! I'm a fan of the Chicago Bulls.
Oh, that's a good team too. I'm glad we could have this conversation. I hope you have a great rest of your day!
